title: Apple and lemon muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '100g caster sugar', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '140g butter', '1 tablespoon lemon zest, or to taste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '235ml milk', '1 large Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and chopped', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
